Reviews.Title: “Repulsive”
Reviews.Author: ulfingert
Reviews.Content: If I think about this place my blood starts boiling. This place is worse than you can immage. The building looks like an homeless house. Our room was smelly, cramped, and infested. It is true this place hasn't any fire prevention system and can be very dangerous. The breakfast room was very hot with no ventilation and the food provived was very poor and bad quality. The service is horrendus. I wish just to see the face of the manager or the owner and ask him how they can manage a barrack like this.

Reviews.Title: “its no 4 stars”
Reviews.Author: vasco3
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the regency recently and its definately no 4 stars more like 2 at best.We found the rooms looked nothing like the pictures I think those were taken at a diferent hotel.They were dark and gloomy and for the most part depressing.The so called breakfast in the bowels of the place was nothing more than buns and meat which is ok if youre looking to eat a sandwich at 7 in the morning.The staff was disinterested in their guests from what I saw never smiling and not friendly at one point I asked the desk attendant to call us a cab and she told me I had to do it myself.That would be alright if I spoke ITALIAN anyways stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “what a let down”
Reviews.Author: salvadores
Reviews.Content: This is the worst four star Hotel i have ever in. EVER. The hotel is very far from everything. The decor and furnishing are cheap and tired. Our room smelled terrible and it was very very noisy. The mattress seemed 20 Years old. The bathroom was very old and grubby. The air condition sounded like a B52 and did not work at all. The staff are hatefull and unhelpfull and the ladies serving the poor breakfast bordering on offensive. This hotel has many many problems. We were extremelly disappointed with the poor quality. The hotel requires a complete overhaul. For us it was a total rip offff.

Reviews.Title: “Not A Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: annyballa
Reviews.Content: This place is run down, mouldy and dirty. The staff not friendly at all and necer smile. If you ask any information they always turn the ayes. The poor breakfast was served in someplace that we used to call the " catacombs" because it was situated in an underground hot canteen. The orange juice was 99% water and the service at the breakfast was extremely rude. This old and dirty hotel has no fire prevention system, everything is flammable and the room door lock was a trap. Did not see any panic bars or fire and smoke alarm. It is very very dangerous and if you stay you will stay at your own risk. It is cheep for a 04 star hotels ( but this is not four star, I think two.) but I prefer to spend a little more and make sure I'll be back home safe.

Reviews.Title: “budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: loughlin
Reviews.Content: we booked this knowing it was a budget hotel, rooms small but what we expected clean nice mini bar, lifts barely fit four,quiet area of the city just inside the old walls is some where to sleep not much more not far from the trevi fountain

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad place to spend a few days”
Reviews.Author: Xosharetraveler
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay! See the pictures at Xoshare dot com. The staff was good to us and the rooms were clean. Realize that European hotel rooms are smaller then American! Good Breakfast each morning.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Best Catholic Pilgrimages booked this hotel for our tour telling us it was a four star hotel. We stayed there four days most without air conditioning--fortunately there was a store accross the street selling fans. All this during a heat wave--it was over 100 degrees every day we were there. The room was about the size of a stateroom, dark and ugly. If you did not know anothers room number too bad. Most of the time the desk would not answer the phone if you called from your room. It was difficult to get anyone to phone for a cab. I could go on, but you get the picture.

Reviews.Title: “Unjust criticism”
Reviews.Author: nmcarmagh
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Regency between 24th May - 28th May and had read the reviews for the hotel prior to my trip. Upon reading the reviews I was dreading seeing the hotel as I thought not everyone could be wrong. We I can honestly say that I was pleasantly surprised. Granted, the hotel is not a 4 star hotel given my experience of 4 star hotels in Ireland. However this hotel is grand, it was clean, the rooms were grand, there was plenty of hot water, the staff were friendly and very helpful. The location of the hotel is excellent as it is only a few minutes walk to the Via Veneto and from there we were able to walk to all the main sights. The Spanish steps where no more than 15-20 mins from the hotel on foot (and we were travelling with a 3 month old baby in our group) and the Villa Borghese was in close proximity. We enjoyed our stay at the Regency and for the location alone would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Sounds Like The Same Old Dump”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: A travel agent arranged my stay back in 2000. This was before everyone knew to check the internet for reviews. My daughter is planning a trip to Italy, which reminded me of this dive. This was the last stop on our trip through England, Wales, Paris, Florence, then Rome. All of our hotels were fine and clean if not luxurious. The Regency was $350+ a night, nearly double all the other rooms so we thought we'd be getting a pretty nice place. Couldn't be more wrong. The place was a dump. Everything was old and dingy. Even the floors were warped. The beds had some ugly used up green spreads, the shower was a shower head in a little tiny plastic enclosure. It was hot and stressful there. Forget the breakfast. We left after I saw what passed for hot chocolate. Reading all these recent reviews, I see the place hasn't changed in 5 years. The rooms look nothing like the pictures. I checked the web when I got home and saw the pictures they posted. An absolute lie. Stay anywhere else. There are Best Westerns there, at least you would have some recourse for such a rip off. A Motel 6 is a 5 star compared to this place. I don't think I'm that picky when it comes to hotels. I'll stay at those old downtown Vegas hotels, but I'd never ever stay at the Regency, even for Free!!!

Reviews.Title: “A fair deal”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We got a good deal as prices go, and wasn't disappointed. The hotel is in a nice and quiet neighbourhood, it's clean and the staff was helpful and correct. Apart from the usual German whiners who seem to think they never get their precious money's worth, the other guests seemed to be mostly families having their needs met. We at least, did so. The amenities are somewhat basic, but we didn't really ask for more given the price that we were offered.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: Franzosish57
Reviews.Content: I cannot understand why this hotel would have 04 stars. I was disappointed in the rating system used for this hotel and think we were misled. This hotel is shabby, but not shabby chic, just shabby and unkempt appearing. I think the owner did not spend one cent for renovation for the the last 30 years. Our room was very old and dark, no words for the bathroom. Hot water was an optional and the water ( mostly cold ) of the shower went everywere except my body. The staff had no interest in making the guests feel welcomed or significant. Everything seemed to be a great deal of trouble for them. Breakfast was no bad but the ladies serving the coffe ( two of them ) had a terrible body odor. It has been years since I hvve stayed in a place like this and hope I never repeat the experience.

Reviews.Title: “How desperate are you?”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Not a 4 star hotel for sure! Go there only if you cannot afford a better one. It looks terrible and the rooms do not look like the photos. Onthe other side it is cheaper than most 3 star hotels in Rome, it is clean and the breakfast in the dungeons is not bad! The staff is a bit rude.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap in every sense”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Could not complaint very much because we did pay Euro 80,00 for a double room, 02 persons. But if I did paid 81,00 Euro I will start to complaint because this Hotel has many lacks. First of all is very very old, second the staff is not very helpfull, third because they off the Air Condition at night, forth because the room we had was very small, fifth because is dirty, sixth bacause I think is not really four stars but two and half. So if you want to stay here do not pay more than 80,00 Euro.

Reviews.Title: “Shabby”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I consider myself fairly well travelled and this is undoubtedly the worst Hotel I have had the misfortune to stay in. The Hotel was dirty and poorly mainteined. The stairswells, corridors, doors and general fornitures gave a student hostel feel. During our stay we were treated with appelling lack of care. In the room there was stains on the paperwall and there was fungus all over the bathroom which was very very very old and not hygienic to use. Breakfast room was a steam bath in an narrow canteen with no A/C, limited food and very poor service. Beware and do not stay at this HOSTEL.

Reviews.Title: “Lying Descriptions”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We made this booking because the Hotel was listed as a Four Stars property and listed among its amenities. When we went in we were surprised at the old and gloomy reception area. We checked in after midnight and the night clerk couldn't understand one word of English. The elevator dropped and bounced when we got into it. We feared we might stuck in there. The room was cramped, dark and reeking of smoke of cigarettes. The bathroom was old and dirty. It could be described as staff accommodation. The bed was tiny and fitted with scratchy quality sheets. The hotel is not central as advertised but a LOOOOOONG WALK to everything. 45 minutes walk to Spanish Square and LORD KNOWS how LOOOOONG to the Colosseum and the Vatican. The Transports are not convenient. Unfortunately a very bad experience.

Reviews.Title: “Not a Four Stars Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The exterior of the Hotel looks decrepit. Hard to believe it is a Four Stars Hotel, should be Two Stars. Rude and unobliging staff especially in the morning having breakfast. Our room was shabby with very worn furnishing. The bathroom needed updating yesterday. The shower only was a small square. The shower curtain was falling apart and did not completely cover the shower which meant wet floor after you use the shower. Bed sheets changed after four days. The Hotel in general is dark, very worn and very depressing. Not a good experience sadly. This is not a place to return to.

Reviews.Title: “NOT A GOOD HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: By far the worst hotel experience I have had in a long time. Although we had booked a double room, when we got to our room we found it to be a small single room, dirty, dusty, stinky toilet with one towel, one glass, one bed slighly larger than a small single bed. In addition, there was no hot water for two days as boiler broke down. The staff was arrogant when we made a complain and there were no apologies. They called the repairman only after several complains. we tried to talk to the manager but never available so this confirms the arrogant attitude. There are better hotels everywhere in Rome so I suggest to choice a better place to stay. Now we are home very upsetting.

Reviews.Title: “right hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: so guys if you don't want to spend a lot of money you can take this hotel, right like a prices, clean, good breakfast, situaded in down town, 15 min walking to the spanish steps, right 4 stars hotel for right price(older but good)

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experience”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I agree with the previous review, this Hotel is not a Four Stars. Can be a TWO STARS Maximum. They give us a tiny room that we could not move. Hotel is generally dirty expecially the rooms which are full of dust and stinking. We were there on JUNE, Rome was already very hot and we did not have Air Condition, we asked at the Reception and they said they will on the Air Con only on Summer so we had saunas every night. Second and Third day we did not have Hot Water, we asked at the reception and a man with the moustache in an angry way told us IT'S NOT POSSIBLE. We meet other guests and they had the same problem, they could not wash with the hot water for two days like us. The staff of this hotel is terrible, never help and always angry. Breakfast is poor and the service is a very low standard. Once we came back late at night and we had to wait almost One Hour outside before someone came and open the main door for us. I do not recommend this Hotel and of course I will not use it again.

Reviews.Title: “Over rated hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel at best should have been rated 2 stars. Our room window barely closed to drown out the street noise. What made matters worse was that they rationed the air conditioning time. It went off about 3:00am just about the time the garbage truck came to empty the bins. Breakfast was fine. The desk clerks were not too friendly. Oh well.

HotelInfo.Name: Regency Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Romagna 42, 00187 Rome, Italy
